title: So I got tri force on riven
body:
Satisfying as hell but what about cost efficiency? I mean I have seen silver riven mains never finish an item until they get tiamat because the black cleaver doesn't build out of brutaliser anymore. Also, even though she benefits so much off triforce, it doesn't help her snowball as well with the wasted stats.

P.S because I am bronze I can pretty much get away with anything and never learn that it doesn't work until someone tells me otherwise

Thoughts?

replies.body: If you want to throw your cash into something you wouldn't normally build make it Infinity Edge and get Youmus instead of BC you will frequently crit people for half their health because of your passive it is one of the most fun things to do on Riven but only works if you snowball enough to afford IE which if your good at Riven and in bronze you should be able to do consistantly
and here i am thinking people arent that stupid. ill never criticise a lee song triforce again
